divs: Sighting DetailsWe were sitting in the hot tub, watching the sky. My husband suddenly said, "What the hell is that?". I looked at him and he was looking directly over the roof toward the north. There appeared a bright circular object passing in a southerly direction, directly overhead. We both looked up and followed its path with our eyes from the top of the roof across sky, until we lost sight through the trees. I was facing south and watched it pass overhead as it headed south. In a matter of a few seconds, approximately 3, it was gone, so it had to be incredibly fast. It was many times larger than the stars in the sky. There was no tail, just a bright object, no sound.
Summary: bright circular object shot overhead - horizon to horizon
